original_text: Some time after that, the Israelites fought a battle against the Philistines at Gezer. In that battle, Sibbecai from Hushah killed Sippai. Sippai was a descendant of Rapha. So Israel won against the Philistines.
korean_text: 이 후에 블레셋 사람들과 게셀에서 전쟁할 때에 후사 사람 십브개가 키가 큰 자의 아들 중에 십배를 쳐죽이매 그들이 항복하였더라

sentences.original_text: the Israelites fought a battle against the Philistines at Gezer.
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들은 게셀에서 블레셋 사람들과 싸웠습니다.

sentences.original_text: Sippai was a descendant of Rapha.
So Israel won against the Philistines.
